availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert D. Spalding (Morganfield, Union County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Morganfield, Union County, Kentucky, physician. Union County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah E. Spalding. Physician in Morganfield in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) as a surgeon.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 528.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers War 1861-65, vol. 1 (Frankfort: Legislature of Kentucky, 1915), 486-7.
Find A Grave, "Dr. Robert D. Spalding (May 4, 1833-Nov 29, 1907)," Memorial #9537435, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/9537435 (accessed January 15, 2020).
